storyInfo: To console a girl saddened by the death of her pet, Xiaobai decides to hold a funeral so that the girl can say goodbye.

attributes.content: Good morning, Min-Min.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Oh hi, Xiaobai. You look like you're—
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: On-duty physicians, please report to Ward 11. This morning, the patient's Blood Originium-Crystal Density spiked sharply and the Originium on the intercostal surface started to grow, causing severe pain. We have assessed this to be an acute exacerbation.
attributes.name: Intercom

attributes.content: Prepare emergency medication and facilities. I'll be there shortly.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Min-Min, is there anything I can—
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Let's talk about this after I get back.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Um, o-okay.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Morning, Xiaobai. Did you have breakfast yet?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Hello, Rockrock. I went to the cafeteria early this morning.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Do you have a moment, Rockrock? The sewage treatment system in the office seems to be malfunctioning. Do you think you could go take a look?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: You're in luck, I happen to have my tools on me today. Mind showing the way?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I think I–
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I'll see you this afternoon, Xiaobai.
attributes.name: Rockrock
Xiaobai
attributes.content: Um... I think I might be able...

attributes.name: Xiaobai
attributes.content: ...to help?
*sigh*... Everyone seems so busy right now.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Good morning, Xiaobai!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh hi, Suzuran. Did you have any plans today?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Um, a few patients passed away over the last few days, leaving their prized possessions behind. I'm taking them out as a way of sending them off, so hopefully their souls will be able to rest in peace.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Does that... happen often in your line of work?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm. Even though the medics try their best to rescue them, some tragedies are inevitable.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Can I help out with the funeral? I'd like to do something for them too.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Funeral? Oh, no, it's nothing as fancy as that. It's just a small ritual.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So it's okay, I can handle it myself.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Just you being here is enough. A bunch of operators have told me that the patients have been smiling a lot more since you came.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Haha, really?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mhm. Oripathy treatment is a long and boring process. The time they've spent chatting with you really means a lot to them.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I'm so glad to hear that. I just wish I could be more useful in other ways.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: For us, the fact that you can talk to the patients without any fear in your eyes is already something we're really grateful for. You're doing great.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But isn't that like literally the least you could do? The more you say stuff like that, the more I feel like I haven't done anything special.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Oh no, it's getting late. I really need to get going.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Then I won't keep you any longer!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: See you later then!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Bye!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (*pouts*) Ugh, another day where I can't help anyone out...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: And that cousin of mine... He clearly agreed that we'd go help Xiaoyuan find her storm cloudbeast together, but he ended up leaving to go search for clues without me.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: ...I was the one who tried to help, but I only ended up holding him back.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Just like when we were out in the barrens. There wasn't a single thing I could help out with. I only made him more worried.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: There has to be something else I can do, right? I can't rely on him forever.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: What's eating you up, Xiaobai?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Oh, when did you get back? Did you learn anything about the cloudbeast?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I did, but it's not good news. It's... gone.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: How could this be... Does Xiaoyuan know?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mhm. I just came back from her ward.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: She must be so sad right now... What should we do?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: That's up to you.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Me? What can I do?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I'm sure she needs your company right now. Go cheer her up, alright?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Is just being there... enough to cheer her up?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: If anyone can do it, it's you. I'm sure of it.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Okay! I'll stay with her and help her get through this!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven... *sob*...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Can I come in, Xiaoyuan? I brought you some candy.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Quickly wipes tears away)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Oh, come in, the door's unlocked.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Let's play a little game. Can you guess which hand the candy is in?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Come on, just take a guess.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Your right hand?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Haha, you got it! Congrats on winning the strawberry candy. As a reward, I'll also give you the peach candy in my other hand.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Pff.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Mind if I sit next to you?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: I just saw Ah Gen coming back from here.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Are you doing alright, Xiaoyuan?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I... I'm really grateful to him, but... I'm going to need some time.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Holds on to Xiaoyuan's hand)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mm. I'm always here for you. If you ever need someone to talk to, just come to me!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Massages Xiaoyuan's fingers)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Ah Gen... brought back a collar. It was the one that I gave to Sixty-Seven.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: The top part... was soaked in blood. I can't imagine what he went through. He must've been in so much pain.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: (Tightly squeezes Xiaoyuan's hand)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: *sigh*... It's okay, you don't have to worry about me. I made a promise to Rockrock that I wouldn't lose to grief.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: I think you're doing fine.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: So... are you going to go with her to the Rhodes Island landship next week?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Mmhmm. I've already packed my bags—they're under the bed. Without Sixty-Seven, there's nothing left for me here. I'm ready to leave.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Xiaoyuan...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Say, why don't we hold a funeral for him?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: A funeral?!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Yeah. Let's hold a small funeral before you leave, so you get a chance to say goodbye.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Stop joking around. Only rich people can afford funerals. Folks like us don't even dare dream of it.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: So many Infected die here without getting funerals.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: ...Even if you don't want to dream of it, I will!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Huh...?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: It's not healthy not to say goodbye to those who leave us. Just leave Sixty-Seven's funeral to me!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Excuse me, sir, is this the Fair Departures Funeral Parlor?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: How'd the receptionist let a little kid in? Someone, get them out of here!
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Wait, I'm not playing around! I'm here to organize a funeral!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: So, do you want to buy funeral supplies, or would you like a team to organize it for you?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: I, I'd like a team!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: So, who will we be conducting this funeral for?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: My friend's pet.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Ahahaha! This has to be some kind of prank, right? Only people with more money than common sense would host a funeral for a pet in Lungmen.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Why are you laughing? What's so funny about that?!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Ah, to be young and idealistic again.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: I'll just tell you straight up: since our establishment, our company has had countless clients here, all wealthier than you can imagine. Among them, some have even been qualified to be buried in the cemetery in the middle of the city.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: What, so you're too good for us ordinary folks?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Young lady, when someone's loved one passes away in Lungmen, they usually purchase their wreaths and candles from us. Even a spontaneous gathering in the square counts as a funeral.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: So asking a professional team to host one for your little pet is more than a little extravagant.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Extravagant? Is it that expensive?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I guess I'll pass then... I don't have much money. But if you have anything here that I can use for it, I'll just take some of that.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Everything here is for people, though... Honestly, we don't carry a single thing for pets. What kind of creature are we talking about anyway? I'll see if I can pick out something usable for you.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: It's a storm cloudbeast. Here's a picture.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Huh? Why does it look so familiar... Wait, isn't this Lady Yuan's cloudbeast?)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Young lady, do you mind if I ask for your friend's name?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: I call her Xiaoyuan.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (As in 'Little Yuan'? Is she really on a nickname basis with Lady Yuan? Could this girl be one of her friends?)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (The Yuan family did make a phone call a few days ago to inquire about possible funerary services for a lost cloudbeast.)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (Could she be here on their behalf?)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Ahem... So, uh, was Miss Yuan's cloudbeast never found in the end?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: That's right. Xiaoyuan asked a bunch of people to look for it. Finally, my cousin found its collar soaked in blood, so we assume it's dead.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Ahh, Lady Yuan hired so many people, enough to turn Lungmen inside-out, yet still couldn't find it. What awful luck.)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Pardon me for prying, but how has Miss Yuan been doing lately?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: She's trying to be strong, but I can feel her sadness.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Tch... The boss has always wanted to curry favor with the Yuans, so I can't just ignore this girl...)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (I should've realized sooner. What kind of child from an ordinary family would even consider a funeral for a pet?)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: I'm so sorry to hear that, young lady. Don't worry, we will handle the funeral. I'm sure Miss Yuan will be most satisfied with the results.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: But, didn't you just say it was too extravagant to hold one for a pet?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: There's no need to dwell too much on what I just said, young lady. We would be honored to carry her thoughts and feelings, and share her pain.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Oh, so does that mean...?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: We shall fully cover the expenses. After the procession is over, I only hope that Miss Yuan can put in a good word for us with the boss.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: If you're willing to help, Xiaoyuan will definitely sing your praises when she sees it.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: That would be a great honor, haha. May I ask for your family name?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Luo.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Miss Luo, Miss Yuan is lucky to have a friend like you.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (*blushes*) Ahaha, I wouldn't go that far...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: This way, please. Allow me to introduce you to some of our establishment's award-winning services.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: The first plan we offer is exquisite papercrafts. The works you see here were all painstakingly handmade by masters from Shangshu.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Encompassing all aspects of the life of the deceased, we also offer packages for different ages, genders, and personalities.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: There are even game consoles and handhelds here... Do you think you'll have anything suitable for a pet?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: We can make a custom set for the cloudbeast, including paper nests, bowls, and climbing towers, as well as paper food tins and freeze-dried goods.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: ...You really do have everything here, huh.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Please take a look at our second plan—a procession of flowers.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Wow, the colors in this wreath are so vivid... My eyes feel like they're going to bloom.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: That's right. This wreath is made up of a comprehensive arrangement of flowers corresponding to the five elements and eight trigrams.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: When used in a funeral, it blesses the family, the clan, and their descendants, making it the best choice for funeral accessories.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Um, it's a pretty small animal, so I don't think such a big wreath would make sense.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: We'll make a smaller replica and send it over. Upon it will be written an elegiac couplet by the famous Lungmen calligrapher, Hsieh Te-hao.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Thanks for doing all of this.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Last, but not least, is our trump-card service, ever a customer favorite.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Father! Oh, dear father! May you forever rest in peace!
attributes.name: Staff Member Clad in Black

attributes.content: (Freezes up in shock)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: What in the world is this?!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Hey, stop rehearsing here. Can't you see you're scaring our client?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Oh, it's okay, I'll be fine...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: This is our ambience team, dedicated to creating a sense of grief at the proceedings, to give the guests a more immersive mourning experience.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: So, um... What kind of atmosphere are we supposed to have for a pet funeral?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Quick, give this young lady a demo. The cloudbeast version.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (Carefully puts on a cloudbeast-ear headband)
attributes.name: Staff Member Clad in Black

attributes.content: Mreeeeeoowwwwwww, mrreeeooooowwwww!
attributes.name: Staff Member Clad in Black

attributes.content: I... I've learned something new today.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Are you sure this address is correct, Miss Luo?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Yes, we've already been over this a few times.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: You're absolutely sure that Miss Yuan lives here?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Yup, this is the place.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Very well then. I shall arrange for your supplies to arrive at this address. Once again, you're absolutely sure you don't need our staff to preside over the funeral? They are all eminent monks with rich experience.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Thanks, but we already have someone in mind.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: May I ask who that might be?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: She's one of our friends from Higashi. She grew up in a shrine, so she's familiar with all kinds of rituals.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Ah, so it's a friend of Miss Yuan's. Do forgive me for my ignorance.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (I see, so it's become popular among the upper crust to invite foreign spiritualists to recite the scriptures. We should add that to our list of services.)
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: That being the case, I won't hold you any longer. There's still more work to be done, of course, but if you ever need our help, please don't hesitate to drop by.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Thank you for your time.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Xiaoyuan, why are you standing outside? You can come in.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Who was that?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Just a kind-hearted person. I was just planning to buy a few things and arrange them myself, but after I showed him the photo of Sixty-Seven, he suddenly offered to help us!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: There's so much stuff on the ground here... It must've been expensive. How much did you pay for all this?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Nothing, actually. The nice man said they'd cover all the expenses. He even asked how you were doing.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Wow, that's not something you see every day. I didn't think there'd be anyone willing to help people like us.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: So what do you think? They managed to get all this out in a single day.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: They look wonderful, just like the real deal. Even when Sixty-Seven was still here... he never got to use such nice things.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: If I'd known, I'd have come earlier to thank the man properly.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: I'd better thank you too, Xiaobai. Without you here, I never would've dared to try something like this.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: I should be thanking you.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Everyone's been so busy ever since I arrived, and I haven't been able to help out at all.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I can't treat people, I don't know Arts, and I can't fix anything. All I can do is watch the patients suffer, grieve, and even... depart.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: So, I'm really happy I could do something for you. And, thank you for believing in me.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (*shakes head*) You've been great.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: But let's not dwell on that! The funeral's about to start!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Oh, but Suzuran isn't back yet. I wanted to ask her to host it.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: She should already be back from today's ritual.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: I'll go look for her then. Wait for me right here!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Tilts her head, watching Xiaobai disappear into the distance)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: If only I could be like Xiaobai... So honest and brave.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Bro, you won't believe who I just got as a client. Yeah, I couldn't believe it either—the Yuan family's eldest daughter.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (Wait, that gentleman hasn't left yet?)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Should I go say hi? He's on the phone though, and looks kind of busy.)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Well, maybe I'll wait a little bit.)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Miss Yuan called the boss a while ago. Do you remember that?
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: She said she lost her storm cloudbeast last month, and if she couldn't find it, she'd call us to ask for a funeral. Well, today, her friend found it.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (Wait, didn't Xiaoyuan's pet go missing more than a year ago?)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: But, the address her friend gave me seemed a bit off. She asked me to deliver the items to a pharmaceutical company called Rhodes Island, not the Yuan estate.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: But that isn't outside the realm of possibility. The Yuan family's been producing cosmetics for years, so it wouldn't surprise me if they branched out to medicine too.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (The Yuan family? But, Yuan is her first name, not a family name... And what cosmetics? I've never seen any operators making cosmetics.)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Well, let's not worry about it. Anything that helps me climb the corporate ladder and rub shoulders with the Yuan family is a good thing.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: (None of this sounds like Xiaoyuan at all!)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Wait, was there some sort of misunderstanding?)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I'm not sure what's going on, but I should find Suzuran first.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: This is where the funeral for the Infected was held, huh... It couldn't be more different from the park we saw this morning.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Are these photos for people to pay their respects?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Some of these people were still so young...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Isn't this... Sixty-Seven?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: The other half of the photo is covered.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Reaches to move the photo covering it)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Huh, that's strange. Who's this man carrying Sixty-Seven?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: ...What's going on?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.text: For all living beings, suffering has no end. The cycle starts anew, and they step into peace once more.

attributes.content: Is that Suzuran chanting?!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Suzuran!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Xiaobai? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: We noticed you hadn't returned to the office yet, so I came to look for you.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Oh, I totally lost track of the time. I was so absorbed in my prayers that I didn't even notice the sun changing places in the sky.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Were all the people in the photos patients who recently passed on? I never knew there were so many.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: It's not just our patients, but other Infected as well. They don't have their own cemetery, or enough money for a funeral, so friends and relatives will come hang photos of them to pay their respects.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: They don't bring anything with them except photos?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Just having a photo is already pretty good. Some people... don't even have that.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Suzuran, were you praying for all the Infected people who've passed?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: All things have a soul, and death is not the end of life. I can't bear to simply leave all these photos like this, so I recite the scriptures a few extra times in hopes of ending their suffering and letting them find peace.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Does it really work?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I'm not sure, but it's all I can do for them.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Why does it have to be this way? Not only do Oripathy patients not get a good life, they can't even have a proper burial?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I just don't understand.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Xiaobai remembers the park she went to yesterday. Candles and flowers placed on clean, neat grass. All sorts of people attended the funeral, solemn-faced and sorrowful.
But this place couldn't be more different.
The weathered photos, the rusted barbed wire, the strident screeches, and choking smell in the air all told her—
When the Infected pass, the only thing they can take with them is life itself.
...What's wrong, Xiaobai?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Someone...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: ...showed me a very different sort of funeral.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: For a non-Infected person, right?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Mm. It was spectacular.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Whose was it?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It was... someone's pet.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: A pet?!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So, your friend isn't Miss Yuan?!
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: I don't know who you were talking about, but it's definitely not my friend, Xiaoyuan.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Then why didn't you speak up earlier?! You little fraud!
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: I wasn't trying to lie to you! Wasn't it your own misunderstanding?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Damn it, what awful luck. The boss isn't going to let me hear the end of it.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Alright, take everything away. Don't leave a single thing behind.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Staff Member Clad in Black

attributes.content: Still professional to a fault, huh?
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: What the hell do you know? This is professionalism!
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: Damn it all. Blast this accursed luck.
attributes.name: Funeral Parlor Staff

attributes.content: He won't make us pay him back, will he Min-Min?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Probably not. You can't exactly go around airing your own dirty laundry in Lungmen. He tried to do this under-the-table, so no one else is responsible for his loss.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: To be honest... I still kind of feel bad.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: There's nothing to feel bad about. Two-faced people like him ought to get hoist by their own petard. Let's go find Xiaoyuan. She said she's waiting for you over at that empty lot.
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: There you are, Xiaobai! That guy didn't give you any trouble, did he?
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: No, he made his own bed...
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: That's good. It's better not to associate with people like that.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: But I still owe you an apology. I promised you I'd hold a funeral for Sixty-Seven, but I'm empty-handed now that he's taken everything back.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: It's for the best. I wouldn't want to use any of it anyway.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: But... those things were so beautiful.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Yes... They were. And might've made us look good, but I couldn't stand seeing them.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: You weren't satisfied with all that?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I think what she meant was, all that fancy-pants stuff is for the upper crust. What Xiaoyuan wants is the dignity of an Infected.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Mm... That's right.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: And what good is dignity if it's borrowed under a fake identity?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: So, thank you for telling me the truth, Xiaobai.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: No need to thank me. In the end, I couldn't do anything for you.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Pats Xiaobai's head)
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: C'mon, don't say stuff like that.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: What a person can accomplish in a single lifetime is like a drop in the ocean. But that doesn't represent all that you are, or mean that the time and effort you spent on it are meaningless.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: So, thank you for always trying to lend a helping hand. Even if... you're terrible at fixing things.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: That doesn't make me feel better at all.
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Heehee. Looks like I need to thank you as well. Maybe you can't treat Oripathy, but you weren't afraid to get close to us.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: What's so special about that?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: (Extends her hand)
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: I'm trying to catch the golden pearls falling from your eyes. They're worth good money!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.content: Ah Gen, aren't you going to say something?!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Haha, she's not wrong, is she?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah Gen!
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: Everything begins with a single meeting. That's what my dad once told me.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Then, my mom added that everything must also end with a painful parting.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So I asked them, what's the difference between a meeting and a parting?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The answer they gave me was this: the miracles that come between them, one after another.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So, we gather here to thank the friends who've bravely entered our lives, leaving behind the miracles of understanding, tolerance, and companionship in our empty, desolate hearts.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: These miracles are enough to sustain us for the rest of our lives, solely because—
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I met you, and you met me.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Thank you, Sixty-Seven.
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan

attributes.text: The evening wind blends with the wailing and weeping of the dark night. Sun-soaked weeds and moisture-rusted fences rustle and creak a sad song.
A girl hangs a picture of the storm cloudbeast on an old barbed-wire fence, the faded and weathered photos next to her whispering almost inaudibly into the wind.
Everyone falls silent, letting the sky sink into darkness, succumbing to the encroachment of nightfall.
But the sun's last rays do not relent, insisting on tearing through the dim sky with one last, vivid burst of red.
The silence is broken by a voice.

attributes.content: Xiaobai?! Ah Gen?!
...What are you two doing here too?
(Turns around in surprise)
attributes.name: Xiaobai

attributes.content: This isn't an illusion, is it?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven!
attributes.name: Xiaoyuan
